si.title: යාපනයේ කිලෝග්රෑම් 31 ක් කේරළ ගංජා සමඟ තරුණයා අත්අඩංගුවට ගෙන තිබේ
body_lines: සොල්දාදුවන් එම ස්ථානයට පැමිණ ගංජා පැකේජ සමඟ ගංජා පැකේජ සමඟ ගංජා පැකේජ වඩමලා කැනාබිස් ඇසුරුම්වල වඩමරා කැනල් පැකට් ජාවාරම් කළහ.

en.title: Youth arrested with 31 kg Kerala ganja in Jaffna
body_lines: Soldiers rushed to the scene and arrested the youth with ganja packages on the basis of confidential information received by the Army Intelligence Unit that a young man smuggled Kerala cannabis packs in the Vadamarachchi sandal area.
Army sources said that the rescued cannabis packages were 31 kg and the arrested youth and the recovered cannabis had been handed over to the Point Pedro Police for further legal action.

summary_lines: A youth was arrested in Jaffna with 31 kg of Kerala ganja based on intelligence tips. Soldiers found the drugs in the Vadamarachchi area and turned the suspect and cannabis over to the police for prosecution.
